resources.string: Your quiz has been saved locally in offline storage.\nTo let others try your quiz, you have to make it online

When you make your quiz available ONLINE, plenty of benefits are waiting for you to explore:
 1) Your quiz will be saved on our database, which allows you to review and modify it
 2) You can share and challenge others to do your quiz
 - You will receive feedback (scores,ratings,review,etc) from whose taking your quiz
 - You will also able to review, grade and send back feedback for whom doing your quiz
 - There are no limits on how many people you share your quiz at one time. BUT there is a limit of 5 times ONLY for you to share a quiz with others.

When your quiz is saved on local offline-storage. There are some restrictions:
 1) Your quiz will be saved locally for 5 days. After 5 days, the system will automatically deleted your quiz
 HOWEVER, you can always MAKE IT ONLINE before your quiz reaches 5-day-expiration
 2) You can review your quiz, but cannot edit it. Edit/Modify feature only available when you make your quiz online
